definition: approved for distribution/to provide (wages etc) as usual (e.g. while an employee is on maternity leave)
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
variant of 照[zhao4]/to shine/to illuminate
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Some companies, she added, pay employees’ salaries while they take time off to participate in humanitarian or relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有些公司在员工请假参加人道和救济工作时照发工资。

sentences.english: Women workers are entitled to maternity leave with full pay.
sentences.chinese: 女工产假期间工资照发。

sentences.english: Since you're not willing to work, why should the state continue to pay you wages as if you were?
sentences.chinese: 你既然不愿意工作，国家为什么还要照发工资呢？

sentences.english: A free vacation on top of a pay raise is icing on the cake.
sentences.chinese: 加了工资还有工资照发的假期，真是锦上添花。

sentences.english: The annex is reproduced as received, in English only.
sentences.chinese: 附件只按英文本原文照发。

sentences.english: She now knows she doesn't have a disorder, but still gets the ads.
sentences.chinese: 即便她现在知道自己没患子宫病，广告仍然照发不误。

definition: to issue/to grant/to distribute
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
variant of 照[zhao4]/to shine/to illuminate
photograph/picture/CL:張|张[zhang1],套[tao4],幅[fu2]
blueprint/to make a blueprint
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
selfie
head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
variant of 曬|晒[shai4]
paid leave
to reissue/(of a disease) to recur/(of a patient) to suffer a relapse
to take a picture
to supply again (sth lost)/to reissue/to pay retroactively
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
